TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23DB+test12av.tds.ieselect p.person_code, p.person_type, t.person_type_description, p.title, p.forename, p.surname, p.known_as, b.badge_number, p.email_address, d.department_description, decode(safe_get_setting_or_null('use_knownas_in_visitor'), 'Y', nvl(p.known_as, p.forename ||' '|| p.surname), 'N', p.forename ||' '|| p.surname) hostname, nvl(p.known_as, p.forename ||' '|| p.surname) display_name from ca_person_interface p left join ca_badge b on b.person_code = p.person_code and b.person_type = p.person_type left join safe_user u on p.person_code = u.person_code and p.person_type = u.person_type left join ca_kiosk_pin kp on p.person_code = kp.person_code and p.person_type = kp.person_type join ca_person_type_control t on p.person_type = t.person_type left join ca_department d on p.department_code = d.department_code
